name: Box Shooter (Grandisle)
description:
This is a working Prototype of a first person shooter concept game. I was making it as a way to learn the Unreal Engine 4.

There are 8 maps available, all configured fo the player to face 3 waves of simple zombie enemies.

I plan to continue working on the game. The next iteration should have other enemy types and more varying waves of enemies.

Goal: Survive against waves of enemies using the firearms at your disposal.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Aim: Mouse

Shoot: LMB

Switch Weapons: 1 (Pistol), 2 (Auto Rifle), 3 (Shotgun), 4 (Sniper), 5 (Rocket Launcher)

P: Pause Game
